entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:35 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:35 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
